name: Ben Toker
bio: Hey! I'm Ben, president of ObieSource! I am a C.S. and Psychology major. I love Rust, C, Java, and (sometimes) Python. I love to read, play jazz guitar, and make coffee! I want to encourage the spread of knowledge through the C.S. department and help equip those who wish to learn with the tools they need!Let's make some cool stuff ^_^

projects.name: flowst
projects.description: A pomodoro study tool built in rust!
